WoWPaladin:RighteousDuty.NAME: Righteous Duty
WoWPaladin:RighteousDuty.DESCRIPTION: Channel a wowpaladin:Seal_of_Righteousness. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.
WoWPaladin:RighteousDuty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a wowpaladin:Seal_of_Righteousness. NL Retain your hand this turn.

WoWPaladin:JusticeForAll.NAME: Justice For All
WoWPaladin:JusticeForAll.DESCRIPTION: Channel a wowpaladin:Seal_of_Justice. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back. NL Exhaust.
WoWPaladin:JusticeForAll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a wowpaladin:Seal_of_Justice. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

WoWPaladin:WakeOfAshes.NAME: Wake of Ashes
WoWPaladin:WakeOfAshes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain 5 wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:HolySmite.NAME: Holy Smite
WoWPaladin:HolySmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !M! wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:TemplarsVerdict.NAME: Templar's Verdict
WoWPaladin:TemplarsVerdict.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have !M! wowpaladin:Holy, spend it and deal that much plus 15 instead.

WoWPaladin:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
WoWPaladin:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 wowpaladin:Holy. Lose 5 wowpaladin:Holy at end of turn.
WoWPaladin:Prayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 wowpaladin:Holy. Lose 5 wowpaladin:Holy at end of turn. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

WoWPaladin:RighteousAnger.NAME: Righteous Anger
WoWPaladin:RighteousAnger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage per wowpaladin:Holy (Deals !D! Damage). NL Put a copy of this card into your discard pile.

WoWPaladin:Judgement.NAME: Judgement
WoWPaladin:Judgement.DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 Damage. NL Evoke your seal. NL Exhaust.
WoWPaladin:Judgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 Damage. NL Evoke your seal and rechannel it. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:LayOnHands.NAME: Lay On Hands
WoWPaladin:LayOnHands.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:SentinelStance.NAME: Sentinel Stance
WoWPaladin:SentinelStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Gain !M! plated armor.

WoWPaladin:BlindingLight.NAME: Blinding Light
WoWPaladin:BlindingLight.DESCRIPTION: All Enemies gain !M! Weak. NL Gain !M! wowpaladin:Holy. NL Draw a card.

WoWPaladin:FlashOfLight.NAME: Flash of Light
WoWPaladin:FlashOfLight.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:CrusadersJudgement.NAME: Crusader's Judgement
WoWPaladin:CrusadersJudgement.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Card. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand.
WoWPaladin:CrusadersJudgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand.

WoWPaladin:DivineStorm.NAME: Divine Storm
WoWPaladin:DivineStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Spend all wowpaladin:Holy and add a free copy of this card for each wowpaladin:Holy spent. (They will exhaust when played)

WoWPaladin:ContemplativeMedicine.NAME: Contemplative Medicine
WoWPaladin:ContemplativeMedicine.DESCRIPTION: Spend all wowpaladin:Holy.  Gain focus equal to wowpaladin:Holy spent.  Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:Vindicate.NAME: Vindicate
WoWPaladin:Vindicate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Don't exhaust.

WoWPaladin:SeraphStrike.NAME: Seraph Strike
WoWPaladin:SeraphStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

WoWPaladin:CrusaderStrike.NAME: Crusader Strike
WoWPaladin:CrusaderStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Deal that much plus !M! damage instead.

WoWPaladin:OathOfVigilance.NAME: Oath of Vigilance
WoWPaladin:OathOfVigilance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL When this is Retained, gain !M! block.

WoWPaladin:OathOfChains.NAME: Oath of Chains
WoWPaladin:OathOfChains.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 plated armor. NL When this is Retained, apply !M! weak to all enemies.

WoWPaladin:OathOfPiety.NAME: Oath of Piety
WoWPaladin:OathOfPiety.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL When this is Retained, gain !M! strength.

WoWPaladin:Aegis.NAME: Aegis
WoWPaladin:Aegis.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! time(s) you would take damage, prevent it. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

WoWPaladin:ArdentDefense.NAME: Ardent Defense
WoWPaladin:ArdentDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Gain !M! more block.

WoWPaladin:AvengersShield.NAME: Avenger's Shield
WoWPaladin:AvengersShield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Gain !B! block for each enemy in combat.

WoWPaladin:AvengingWrath.NAME: Avenging Wrath
WoWPaladin:AvengingWrath.DESCRIPTION: Until end of turn, gain +4 Strength, Dexterity, and Focus. NL Exhaust.
WoWPaladin:AvengingWrath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Until end of turn, gain +4 Strength, Dexterity, and Focus.

WoWPaladin:EqualizingSwath.NAME: Equality
WoWPaladin:EqualizingSwath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage divided equally among all enemies. NL Gain !M! wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:GuidingStrike.NAME: Guiding Strike
WoWPaladin:GuidingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have !M! wowpaladin:Holy, spend it and gain Retain 2.

WoWPaladin:FistOfTheHeavens.NAME: Fist of the Heavens
WoWPaladin:FistOfTheHeavens.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increased by number of cards in hand.

WoWPaladin:WeaponizedZeal.NAME: Zealotry
WoWPaladin:WeaponizedZeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you do not control a seal, gain !M! energy.

WoWPaladin:CondemnHeresy.NAME: Condemn Heresy
WoWPaladin:CondemnHeresy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - This deals twice as much damage.

WoWPaladin:ValiantCharge.NAME: Valiant Rush
WoWPaladin:ValiantCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. wowpaladin:Valiance - Gain block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

WoWPaladin:HammerOfWrath.NAME: Hammer of Wrath
WoWPaladin:HammerOfWrath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! wowpaladin:Holy. The next attack you play this turn costs 0. NL Choose one: Add a Smite to your hand or Evoke your seal. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:SmiteThem.NAME: Smite Them Down!
WoWPaladin:SmiteThem.DESCRIPTION: Add a Smite to your hand.

WoWPaladin:Smite.NAME: Smite
WoWPaladin:Smite.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your wowpaladin:Holy NL (Strength added after)

WoWPaladin:HandOfReckoning.NAME: Hand of Reckoning
WoWPaladin:HandOfReckoning.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies one time for each discarded card.

WoWPaladin:JusticeDemandsRetribution.NAME: Retribution!
WoWPaladin:JusticeDemandsRetribution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is fatal, gain !M! plated armor.

WoWPaladin:RapturousCharge.NAME: Charge!!!
WoWPaladin:RapturousCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each enemy. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Apply !M! vulnerable to each enemy.

WoWPaladin:RighteousExpulsion.NAME: Righteous Expulsion
WoWPaladin:RighteousExpulsion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Then deal !D! to each enemy.

WoWPaladin:SacredCross.NAME: Holy Shock
WoWPaladin:SacredCross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage two times. NL Damage is increased by your wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:ZealotsThrust.NAME: Zealot's Thrust
WoWPaladin:ZealotsThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you do not control a seal, gain !M! Strength.

WoWPaladin:DivineBulwark.NAME: Divine Bulwark
WoWPaladin:DivineBulwark.DESCRIPTION: Gain plated armor equal to your wowpaladin:Holy, then gain !M! wowpaladin:Holy. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:HammerOfJustice.NAME: Hammer of Justice
WoWPaladin:HammerOfJustice.DESCRIPTION: Stun the target. NL Gain !M! wowpaladin:Holy. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:Resolve.NAME: Resolve
WoWPaladin:Resolve.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL wowpaladin:Valiance - Remove all of your debuffs.

WoWPaladin:LightsMeditation.NAME: Light's Meditation
WoWPaladin:LightsMeditation.DESCRIPTION: Put X cards from your discard into your hand and Retain them this turn. NL Exhaust.
WoWPaladin:LightsMeditation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put X+1 cards from your discard into your hand and Retain them this turn. NL Exhaust.

WoWPaladin:Brace.NAME: Brace
WoWPaladin:Brace.DESCRIPTION: When you take damage, gain 3 block.
WoWPaladin:Brace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you take damage, gain 3 block.

WoWPaladin:EstablishmentPaladin.NAME: Establishment
WoWPaladin:EstablishmentPaladin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Retained, lower its cost by 1.
WoWPaladin:EstablishmentPaladin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is Retained, lower its cost by 1.

WoWPaladin:RetributionAura.NAME: Retribution Aura
WoWPaladin:RetributionAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain wowpaladin:Holy, gain !M! Strength.
WoWPaladin:RetributionAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain wowpaladin:Holy, gain !M! Strength.

WoWPaladin:ResistanceAura.NAME: Resistance Aura
WoWPaladin:ResistanceAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain wowpaladin:Holy, gain !M! Dexterity.
WoWPaladin:ResistanceAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain wowpaladin:Holy, gain !M! Dexterity.

WoWPaladin:ConcentrationAura.NAME: Concentration Aura
WoWPaladin:ConcentrationAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain wowpaladin:Holy, gain !M! Focus.
WoWPaladin:ConcentrationAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain wowpaladin:Holy, gain !M! Focus.

WoWPaladin:GrandCrusader.NAME: Grand Crusader
WoWPaladin:GrandCrusader.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each round, gain 5 wowpaladin:Holy. NL Ethereal.
WoWPaladin:GrandCrusader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each round, gain 5 wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:CrusaderAura.NAME: Crusader Aura
WoWPaladin:CrusaderAura.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each round, gain temporary Retain equal to your wowpaladin:Holy.
WoWPaladin:CrusaderAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of each round, gain temporary Retain equal to your wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:Consecration.NAME: Consecration
WoWPaladin:Consecration.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each round, deal damage to each enemy equal to !M! times the number of cards in your hand.

WoWPaladin:Repentance.NAME: Repentance
WoWPaladin:Repentance.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your seal. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
WoWPaladin:Repentance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your seal. NL Draw !M! cards.

WoWPaladin:Purge.NAME: Purge
WoWPaladin:Purge.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a curse, exhaust it, heal !M! HP, then draw a card.
WoWPaladin:Purge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you draw a curse, exhaust it, heal !M! HP, then draw a card.

WoWPaladin:ZealousPersecution.NAME: Zealous Persecution
WoWPaladin:ZealousPersecution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you do not control a seal, subtract !M! Strength from the target.

WoWPaladin:Thorns.NAME: Shield Spikes
WoWPaladin:Thorns.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back.

WoWPaladin:ShieldUp.NAME: Shield Up!
WoWPaladin:ShieldUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL If you have !M! wowpaladin:Holy, spend it and gain 5 thorns.

WoWPaladin:BladeOfJustice.NAME: Blade of Justice
WoWPaladin:BladeOfJustice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

WoWPaladin:EyeForAnEye.NAME: Eye For An Eye
WoWPaladin:EyeForAnEye.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back. NL Gain 2 wowpaladin:Holy.

WoWPaladin:ExecutionSentence.NAME: Execution Sentence
WoWPaladin:ExecutionSentence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of 3 turns, deal !M! damage to each enemy.
